column4: anyone knows how to install my built in camera?? (sony vaio VGN-FZ21E) I'm running Ubuntu 10.10
i've tried http://bigbrovar.wordpress.com/2008/08/17/ubuntu-on-sony-vaio-fz21e/ but someone told me i need to find newer drivers, r5u87x
try install new kernel from ppa
maybe new kernel have this driver
ppa? you mean synaptic package manager?
i'm running Ubuntu 10.10...this you showed me it's for lucid..i presume it's ok?
yes this is ok you need to add this from lucid NOT maverick reference
like there is in this link
ok, thank you...i'll try it and let you know!
i am running in some netbook ubuntu maverick but my cardreader is not working and i install last kernel (2.6.38-5) and it work fine now
i read this tip in forums
